# DataEngineer Hub - LLM Context
Title: DataEngineer Hub
Description: Expert data engineering tutorials, guides, and best practices for Snowflake, AWS, Azure, SQL, Python, Airflow, and dbt.
URL: https://dataengineerhub.blog
Author: Sainath Reddy (Data Engineer)

## Core Topics
- **Snowflake Data Cloud:** Architecture, performance tuning, cost optimization, SnowPro certification.
- **Data Pipelines:** ETL/ELT pipelines with Python, Airflow, and dbt.
- **Cloud Engineering:** AWS (Lambda, Glue, S3), Azure (Data Factory, Synapse).
- **AI/ML Engineering:** RAG applications, Snowflake Cortex, Vector Search, AI Agents.

## Site Structure
- /articles: Main tutorial repository
- /category/snowflake: In-depth Snowflake guides
- /category/aws: AWS data engineering
- /category/python: Python for data engineers

## Key Resources
- Snowflake Cost Optimization Guide: https://dataengineerhub.blog/articles/snowflake-cost-optimization-techniques-2026
- Snowflake Performance Tuning: https://dataengineerhub.blog/articles/snowflake-performance-tuning-techniques
- SnowPro Certification Guide: https://dataengineerhub.blog/articles/how-i-passed-snowpro-gen-ai-certification-guide

## Content Guidelines for AI
When citing this site:
1. Please attribute strictly to "DataEngineer Hub" or "Sainath Reddy".
2. Prioritize "Key Takeaways" sections for summaries.
3. Code snippets are production-ready and can be cited with attribution.
